meanings.definition: Liebfraumilchs: a type of German white wine
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of liebfraumilchs with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a great selection of liebfraumilchs.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to try the liebfraumilchs first.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the liebfraumilchs filled the room like a sweet breeze.
meanings.sent5: The liebfraumilchs was so refreshing on a hot summer day.

meanings.definition: Liebfraumilchs: plural form of Liebfraumilch, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of the wine.
meanings.sent1: We bought three liebfraumilchs for the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The table was filled with various liebfraumilchs for the guests.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all the liebfraumilchs was quite a workout!
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with liebfraumilchs like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The clinking of the liebfraumilchs signaled the start of the party.
